msg: Merged r1274 from trunk. Since code on trunk was refactored

author: lgo
msg: Follow up r1206: don't register clean_conn as child_cleanup.
In the case an application using serf execs a child process,
this causes the child close socket(s) still used/needed by

author: pquerna
msg: Improve how the ostream buckets are managed, only creating them on demand, and making sure they are always destroyed on all code paths.
